knimeNode.name: Stanford POS tagger
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns part of speech tags to terms.

fullDescription.intro: This node assigns to each term of a document a part of speech (POS) tag, by using the Stanford tagging library (http://nlp.stanford.edu/software/tagger.shtml). The tagging model to use has to be specified in the node dialog. Different models are assigning tags of different tagsets e.g. the German tagging model assigns STTS tags. All tags have to be mapped onto the Penntreebank tagset by a simple mapping file. This file needs to be specified in the nodes dialog. The file may contain only the tags to be mapped. First the source tags, than the target tags, separated by a separation character, e.g. one line should look like <sourcetag>;<targettag>.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the documents to tag.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the tagged documents.
